name: Dice Beat
description:
Boy howdy, never let anyone convince you to make a rhythm game for a game jam.
In the height of the anxiety I was really feeling like we should've went with the ribbit king inspired dice based frolf game idea. But this turned out pretty cool too.

Gameplay kinda inspired by muse dash,
There's 3 different song modes each with a different bpm that can be switched between with the dice.
There's also a few different loops per each song to randomize with dice, as well as a couple different instrument tracks to swap between on the fly.

Feel free to post high scores I guess.

Controls:
F/Up to jump J/Right to punch
Gamepad might also kinda work.

Wanted to make a WebGL build but FMod really doesnt like music in WebGL.

Pretty much it.

Programming: Bolt
Music/Mapping/Art by Richard Soot
